review: Just in 15 minutes of waiting, I got my consultation. *** ****** *** **** ***** It was my only consultation with him but the treatment was highly satisfactory. A few tests were recommended which was accurate and helpful in the diagnosis. I have all good comments with the hospitality and staff.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review: Dr. Iyengar is very calm, listens to your problem and gives adequate time to his patients. His humane way of dealing with patients makes one feel that one is in safe hands. He is very reassuring and won't just prescribe for the heck of it. Thank you doctor for your time and care.
I got expert advice along with the suitable treatment. The medications resulted in great relief. His problem assessment methods and explanation was impressive. I am highly satisfied with the outcome.
